EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email_GPDB Alert_Q214.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Product Advisory: GPCC 1.2.2.0 - Patch release (GPCC 1.2.2.1) available
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We're happy to announce the availability of Pivotal GreenPlum Command Center (GPCC) 1.2.2.1. This release contains the fix for the bug (found in GPCC 1.2.2.0) where users that are not "gpadmin" or "gpmon" cannot login to the GPCC UI/website.
You can download the binaries and release notes from https://network.gopivotal.com/products/pivotal-gpdb <https://network.gopivotal.com/products/pivotal-gpdb> under Greenplum Command Center. For customers having access to EMC software distribution website (SubscribeNet), the new GPCC 1.2.2.1 binaries can be found under the product section.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
